Welcome¶

The classjs-plugins are a set of usefull javascript plugins based on class.js 1.0+ and jquery 1.7+. They are easily extendable, follow the W3C and WCAG 2.0 standards and are build for responsive webdesign.

The latest stable versions are available on github - https://github.com/finalangel/classjs-plugins
